name: Memes - We All Cry
description:
Memes, the VN that started it all. The contents of the game seem to be mostly nonsense but don't be deterred, there's some semblance of a story here. Go here for more info: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCqyl7dLtft4cxBBhH04mUkg

Made with Renpy. Sequels will be released soon!
